title: Challenger Team Against All Odds (AAO)  LF Coach/Analyst

embed.description: Our League of Legends team is currently seeking out a coach/analyst to help us prepare for an upcoming seige on the pro scene. We have a new roster in which we feel can put in a solid effort and push for a spot in the next challenger series, and further more the pro series.

body: The organisation  is looking for a coach or analyst to assist the team in macro strategy for competitive play, we are currently a 5 man roster consisting of 5 challenger players. We are looking for someone with both theoretical and practical knowledge, in other words we would prefer someone who has had success in soloq themselves or coaching other teams in the past. If you are interested please follow the link above to the applicant sheet where there are details to get in contact with us.

replies.body:
Hi, I'm an amateur coach looking for a serious team. Here is the link to my post.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/NLK6xE7d-amateur-coach-lf-serious-team-pref-plat-players

A little more about me:
- I have my own Gold team in Singapore, where I'm the shotcaller
- Currently coaching a Plat level team on a semi-regular basis
- I'm in talks with 3 diamond teams, and after viewing footage I'm confident that I have something to offer at that level and beyond.

I'm looking for a team to challenge myself to the fullest extent, to be able to contribute and refine my skills at the same time, and your team sounds very promising.  I'm sending in an application to the link above and I hope to hear from you soon.  

Cheers
